mapper.select: SELECT D.DNO, D.MNO AS CUSTOMER_NO, M.ID, M.NAME, M.NICKNAME, M.TEL, M.ADDRESS, M.POST_NO, D.RIDER_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MNO=D.RIDER_ID) AS RIDER_NAME, D.REG_ID AS SELLER_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MNO=D.REG_ID) AS SELLER_NAME, (SELECT TEL FROM MEMBER WHERE MNO=D.REG_ID) AS SELLER_TEL, (SELECT POST_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE MNO=D.REG_ID) AS SELLER_POST_NO, (SELECT ADDRESS FROM MEMBER WHERE MNO=D.REG_ID) AS SELLER_ADDRESS, D.COURIER, D.PRODUCT_NAME, D.TRACKING_NO, D.DELIVERY_STATE, D.DELIVERY_SCH_TIME, D.DELIVERY_TIME, D.RECEIVED_TIME, D.RECEIVED_YN, D.RETURN_YN, D.SENDING_YN, D.REG_DATE FROM DELIVERY D LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON D.MNO = M.MNO WHERE D.DNO = #{dno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DELIVERY WHERE DNO = #{dno} AND TRACKING_NO IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE DELIVERY SET RECEIVED_YN = 'Y' , RECEIVED_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE DNO = #{dno}
UPDATE DELIVERY SET DELIVERY_STATE = '배송완료' , DELIVERY_STATE = 'Y' , DELIVERY_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE DNO = #{dno}
